Audio Description: This black and white poster about fuel rationing and the black market features a caricature of a Japanese soldier in the upper left corner. He has large teeth and ears, slanted eyes and a small cap with a rising sun insignia. The text of the poster, in black letters, reads, “You help the enemy of you buy black market gas. Always use legal ration coupons, Pay no more than the legal price.”
Creator: United States. Office of Price Administration
